Class TouchItem

A TouchItem object representing an identifier to track a serial of touch events and location in (x,y) coordinate space of current event.

Constructors

constructor

  • new TouchItem(identifier: number, srcElement: XObject, stageX: number, stageY: number, timestamp: number): TouchItem
    • Defined in components/TouchItem.ts:151

    Constructs and initializes a TouchItem at the specified identifier and (x,y) location in the coordinate space.

    Parameters

    • identifier: number

      the identifier of the newly constructed TouchItem

    • srcElement: XObject

      the source element of the newly constructed TouchItem

    • stageX: number

      the X coordinate in stage of the newly constructed TouchItem

    • stageY: number

      the Y coordinate in stage of the newly constructed TouchItem

    • timestamp: number

    Returns TouchItem

Optional currentTarget

  • Defined in components/TouchItem.ts:135

The current element of this event.

Optional deltaX

deltaX: number
  • Defined in components/TouchItem.ts:147

mousewheel event only, the delta in X direction.

Optional deltaY

deltaY: number
  • Defined in components/TouchItem.ts:151

mousewheel event only, the delta in Y direction.

direction

direction: number
  • Defined in components/TouchItem.ts:122

The move direction, move to up is 0, right is 90, down is 180 and left is 270.

identifier

identifier: number
  • Defined in components/TouchItem.ts:83

The identifier of this TouchItem, used to track a serial of touch events.

pressed

pressed: boolean = false
  • Defined in components/TouchItem.ts:109

Whether the this TouchItem with mouse pressed.

speed

speed: number
  • Defined in components/TouchItem.ts:118

The current move speed, unit is pixel per millisecond.

Optional srcElement

srcElement: XObject
  • Defined in components/TouchItem.ts:87

The first pressed element of this event.

The timestamp of touch event starts.
